titles.title: Stand Up! And Bless The Lord, Your God

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Stand up! and bless the Lord, your God
From everlasting to everlasting.
Stand up! and bless the Lord, your God
From everlasting to everlasting.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Blessed be Your glorious name, O Lord,
Which is exalted above all blessings and praise.
Blessed be Your glorious name, O Lord,
Which is exalted, which is exalted.
(Repeat.)
